overview: Sometimes a female cop's most lethal weapon is the one between her legs - especially if she keeps it well - oiled and neatly trimmed. Meredith, a lowly cop trying to make detective gets her chance when a prisoner turns up dead - and her captain is the most likely suspect. The road that leads to the truth can often be a sleazy one, and Meredith isn't afraid to use her weapon or get her uniform dirty if it means getting to the bottom of things - or things getting into her bottom, whichever comes first! Nope, crime doesn't pay and justice must be served, but that doesn't have a damn thing to do with the incredibly raunchy action that goes down when Meredith goes undercover - and only comes up for air! Just the facts, ma'am!
tagline: A Story About Cops Who Blow First and Ask Questions Later.
title: To Protect and Service
